description.@en: With a ‘snap’ of your fingers, you usher others to move much faster.

effect.@en: After successfully casting this spell, the person you touch increases their Combat Movement and Initiative by 3.

criticalSuccess.@en: As above, but they also gain 1 additional AP per Turn in combat.

criticalFailure.@en: Time begins to ebb strangely around you. The person you intended to hasten immediately ages three years.

reagents.@en: The boot of a weary traveler, worn on your feet

system.distance: Any one person you can touch
